content: moving across the surface of the fabric z nupp right twist k2tog leave stitches on left needle k into first place bead st again and slide both sts off needle lt left twist rt right twist left twist slip 2 stitches individually knitwise put back on 2/1 rc left needle so the back legs of the stitches are now in front k through the back loop of the 2nd stitch and leave on left 2/1 lc needle k2tog through back loop and slide off the needle > 2/2 rc 2/2 lc to place beads use a 75mm crochet hook and insert hook p start picot through hole in bead slip the required stitch off the left 4 consecutive knit stitch count needle and onto hook slide the bead off the hook and onto the stitch replace the stitch back onto the left needle and knit it on a k2tog decrease place the bead on the 2nd st on abbreviations lh needle for an ssk decrease place the bead on the 1st yo yarn over needle to make a stitch stitch on lh needle k2tog knit 2 sts together how to work nupps nupps must be worked loosely on rs ssk slip 2 sts individually knitwise slip back to lh needle row so that the resulting 7 loops can be successfully purled and knit 2 together through back loop together on the following ws row see the abbreviations sk2p slip 1 k2tog pass slipped stitch over for the exact technique nupp all worked into one stitch - k1 yo 3 times k1 once more 1-7 nupp double and quadruple yarn overs when encountering a place bead place a bead on this stitch see pattern notes double yo on the following ws row knit the first loop and purl the second for the quadruple yarn over work the for details when working decreases stitches in this order on the following ws row k p k p biophilia copyright © mary-anne mace 2015 this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knit from this pattern contact mary-anne at maryannemace@gmail com http //www ravelry com/designers/mary-anne-mace 3 left twist slip 2 sts individually knitwise put back on lh row 12-24 beginning and ending with a ws row work needle so back legs of sts are in front k through back loop edge increases only as set in row 1 and 2 129 sts of the 2nd st and leave on lh needle k2 decrease through back 2nd lifted increase row loop and slide both off needle right twist k2tog leaving sts on lh needle knit into 1st st row 25 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into one stitch k9 *work lifted increase k5 repeat from * twenty times until 12 sts again and slide both off needle remain work lifted increase k9 k1 yo k1 into one stitch 2/1 rc slip 1 st to cable needle cn and hold in back k2 k1 k2
